atk-abh03a32:2_0: 776-779. Idāni atthi arahato puññūpacayotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ arahato dānasaṁvibhāgacetiyavandanādīni
atk-abh03a32:2_1: kammāni disvā atthi arahato puññūpacayoti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a32:2_2: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘arahā nāma pahīnapuññapāpo, so yadi
atk-abh03a32:2_3: puññaṁ kareyya, pāpampi kareyyā’’ti codetuṁ apuññūpacayoti āha. Itaro pāṇātipātādikiriyaṁ
atk-abh03a32:2_4: apassanto paṭikkhipati. Puññābhisaṅkhārantiādīsu bhavagāmikammaṁ arahato natthīti
atk-abh03a32:2_5: paṭikkhipati. Dānaṁ dadeyyātiādīsu kiriyacittena dānādipavattisabbhāvato sakavādī
atk-abh03a32:2_6: paṭijānāti. Itaro cittaṁ anādiyitvā kiriyāpavattimattadassaneneva laddhiṁ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a32:2_7: Sā pana ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhāpitā hotīti.
atk-abh03a32:5_0: 780. Idāni natthi arahato akālamaccūtikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘nāhaṁ, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a32:5_1: sañcetanikānaṁ kammānaṁ katānaṁ upacitānaṁ apaṭisaṁveditvā byantībhāvaṁ vadāmī’’ti
atk-abh03a32:5_2: (a. ni. 10.217) suttassa atthaṁ ayoniso gahetvā ‘‘arahatā nāma sabbakammavipākaṁ
atk-abh03a32:5_3: paṭisaṁvedayitvāva parinibbāyitabbaṁ, tasmā natthi, arahato akālamaccū’’ti yesaṁ
atk-abh03a32:5_4: laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikānañceva siddhatthikānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a32:5_5: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘sace tassa natthi akālamaccu, arahantaghātakena nāma
atk-abh03a32:5_6: na bhavitabba’’nti codetuṁ natthi arahantaghātakoti āha. Itaro ānantariyakammassa
atk-abh03a32:6: 781.Visaṁ na kameyyāti pañhe ‘‘yāva pubbe katakammaṁ parikkhayaṁ na gacchati, tāva na kamatī’’ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti.
atk-abh03a32:7_0: 782.Nāhaṁ,bhikkhaveti suttaṁ idaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ – sañcetanikānaṁ kammānaṁ katānaṁ
atk-abh03a32:7_1: vipākaṁ apaṭisaṁveditvā avinditvā ananubhavitvā byantībhāvaṁ tesaṁ kammānaṁ parivaṭumaparicchinnabhāvaṁ
atk-abh03a32:7_2: na vadāmi, tañca kho diṭṭhadhammavedanīyānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme, na tato paraṁ, upapajjavedanīyānaṁ
atk-abh03a32:7_3: anantaraṁ upapattiṁ upapajjitvāva na tato paraṁ, aparāpariyavedanīyānaṁ yadā vipākokāsaṁ
atk-abh03a32:7_4: labhanti, tathārūpe aparāpare vā pariyāye. Evaṁ sabbathāpi saṁsārapavatte sati laddhavipākavāre
atk-abh03a32:7_5: kamme na vijjateso jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammāti. Evaṁ sante yadetaṁ
atk-abh03a32:7_7: ‘‘natthi arahato akālamaccū’’ti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ kataṁ, taṁ dukkaṭamevāti.
atk-abh03a32:10_0: 783. Idāni sabbamidaṁ kammatotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘kammunā vattati loko’’ti
atk-abh03a32:10_1: suttaṁ nissāya ‘‘sabbamidaṁ kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṁ kammatova hotī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi
atk-abh03a32:10_2: , seyyathāpi rājagirikānañceva siddhatthikānañca; te sandhāya sabbamidanti pucchā
atk-abh03a32:10_3: sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘evaṁ sante kammampi kammato āpajjatī’’ti
atk-abh03a32:10_4: codetuṁ kammampi kammatoti āha. Itaro yadi kammampi kammatova nāma taṁ kammaṁ vipākoyeva
atk-abh03a32:10_5: siyāti paṭikkhipati. Pubbekatahetūti ‘‘yadi sabbamidaṁ kammato, pubbekatahetunā tena
atk-abh03a32:10_6: bhavitabba’’nti codetuṁ pucchati, itaro pubbekatahetuvādabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a32:11_0: 784.Kammavipākatoti ‘‘yadi sabbamidaṁ kammato, yaṁ atītabhave pavattassa hetubhūtaṁ
atk-abh03a32:11_1: kammaṁ, tampi purimatare bhave kammatoti kammavipāko sampajjati, tena te sabbamidaṁ
atk-abh03a32:11_2: kammavipākato āpajjatī’’ti codetuṁ pucchati. Itaro bījato aṁkurasseva paccuppannapavattassa
atk-abh03a32:11_3: kammato nibbattiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho tassāpi kammassa bījassa
atk-abh03a32:11_4: purimabījato viya purimakammato pavattattā paṭijānāti. Pāṇaṁ haneyyātiādi ‘‘yadi
atk-abh03a32:11_5: sabbaṁ kammavipākato, pāṇātipātādīni kammavipākeneva kareyyā’’ti codetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:11_6: Itaro dussīlyacetanāpi purimakammanibbattā ekena pariyāyena vipākoyevāti laddhiyā
atk-abh03a32:11_7: paṭijānāti. Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi te pāṇātipāto kammavipākato nibbattati, pāṇātipāto viya
atk-abh03a32:11_8: vipākopi saphalo āpajjatī’’ti codetuṁ saphaloti āha. Itaro pāṇātipātassa nirayasaṁvattanikādibhāvato
atk-abh03a32:11_9: saphalataṁ passanto paṭijānāti. Kammavipākassa pana idaṁ nāma phalanti vuttaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-abh03a32:11_10: apassanto paṭikkhipati. Adinnādānādīsupi eseva nayo. Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro
atk-abh03a32:11_11: saphaloti deyyadhammavasena dānaphalaṁ pucchati. Kammunā vattatīti suttaṁ ‘‘natthi
atk-abh03a32:11_12: kamma’’nti akammavāditaṁ paṭikkhipitvā ‘‘atthi kamma’’nti kammavāditaṁ kammassakataṁ
atk-abh03a32:11_13: dīpeti. Na sabbasseva kammato nibbattiṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a32:14_0: 786-787. Idāni indriyabaddhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha duvidhaṁ dukkhaṁ – indriyabaddhaṁ,
atk-abh03a32:14_1: anindriyabaddhañca. Indriyabaddhaṁ dukkhavatthutāya dukkhaṁ, anindriyabaddhaṁ udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a32:14_2: ‘‘yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha’’nti saṅgahitattā dukkhaṁ. Imaṁ vibhāgaṁ aggahetvā ‘‘yassa
atk-abh03a32:14_3: pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati, taṁ indriyabaddhameva dukkhaṁ, na itara’’nti
atk-abh03a32:14_4: yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṁ, tesaṁ itarassāpi dukkhabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ indriyabaddhaññevāti
atk-abh03a32:14_5: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘yasmā bhagavatā ‘yadaniccaṁ taṁ
atk-abh03a32:14_6: dukkha’nti vuttaṁ, tasmā indriyabaddheneva tena aniccena bhavitabba’’nti codetuṁ
atk-abh03a32:14_7: indriyabaddhaññeva aniccantiādimāha. Nanuanindriyabaddhaṁ aniccanti nanu pathavīpabbatapāsāṇādi
atk-abh03a32:15_0: 788.Na vattabbaṁ indriyabaddhaññeva dukkhanti pañhe āmantāti paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a32:15_1: Anindriyabaddhañhi dukkhadomanassānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ hoti. Uṇhakālasmiñhi aggi sītakāle
atk-abh03a32:15_2: ca vāto dukkhassa ārammaṇaṁ, niccampi bhogavināsādayo domanassassa. Tasmā vināpi
atk-abh03a32:15_3: aniccaṭṭhena anindriyabaddhaṁ dukkhanti vattabbaṁ. Kammakilesehi pana anibbattattā
atk-abh03a32:15_4: dukkhaṁ ariyasaccanti na vattabbaṁ, tathā maggena apariññeyyattā. Yasmā pana tiṇakaṭṭhādinirodho
atk-abh03a32:15_5: vā utubījādinirodho vā dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ nāma na hoti, tasmā indriyabaddhaṁ
atk-abh03a32:15_6: dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca, itaraṁ pana dukkhamevāti idaṁ nānattaṁ dassetuṁ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:15_7: Yathā indriyabaddhassātiādivacanaṁ indriyabaddhassa pariññāya brahmacariyavāsaṁ pariññātassa
atk-abh03a32:15_8: puna anuppattiṁ dīpeti. Tenevettha sakavādinā paṭikkhepo kato. ‘‘Yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha’’nti
atk-abh03a32:15_9: vacanena pana saṅgahitassa anindriyabaddhassa dukkhabhāvaṁ paṭisedhetuṁ na sakkāti, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a32:18_0: 789-790. Idāni ṭhapetvā ariyamaggantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yasmā ariyamaggo ‘dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā’ti
atk-abh03a32:18_1: vutto, tasmā ṭhapetvā ariyamaggaṁ avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a32:18_2: hetuvādānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi evaṁ
atk-abh03a32:18_3: samudayassāpi dukkhabhāvo āpajjatī’’ti codetuṁ dukkhasamudayopīti āha. Itaro hetulakkhaṇaṁ
atk-abh03a32:18_4: sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho pavattapariyāpannabhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:18_5: Tīṇevāti pañhesu suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati, laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a32:21_0: 791-792. Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ paṭiggaṇhātītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha
atk-abh03a32:21_1: ‘‘paramatthato maggaphalāneva saṅgho, maggaphalehi añño saṅgho nāma natthi, maggaphalāni
atk-abh03a32:21_2: ca na kiñci paṭiggaṇhanti, tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ paṭiggaṇhātī’’ti yesaṁ
atk-abh03a32:21_3: laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi mahāpuññavādīsaṅkhātānaṁ vetullakānaṁ; te sandhāya na
atk-abh03a32:21_4: vattabbanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi saṅgho na paṭiggaṇheyya,
atk-abh03a32:21_5: na naṁ satthā āhuneyyātiādīhi thomeyyā’’ti codetuṁ nanu saṅgho āhuneyyotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a32:21_6: Saṅghassa dānaṁ dentīti ‘‘ye te saṅghassa denti, te paṭiggāhakesu asati kassa dadeyyu’’nti
atk-abh03a32:21_7: codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Āhutiṁ jātavedo vāti suttaṁ parasamayato āgataṁ. Tattha mahāmeghanti
atk-abh03a32:21_8: meghavuṭṭhiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Vuṭṭhiñhi medanī paṭiggaṇhāti, na meghameva. Maggo
atk-abh03a32:21_9: paṭiggaṇhātīti ‘‘maggaphalāni saṅgho’’ti laddhiyā vadati, na ca maggaphalāneva saṅgho.
atk-abh03a32:21_10: Maggaphalapātubhāvaparisuddhe pana khandhe upādāya paññattā aṭṭha puggalā saṅgho,
atk-abh03a32:24_0: 793-794. Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘maggaphalāneva
atk-abh03a32:24_1: saṅgho nāma, na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetuṁ sakkonti, tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅgho
atk-abh03a32:24_2: dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a32:24_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Āhuneyyotiādi ‘‘yadi saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-abh03a32:24_4: na naṁ satthā evaṁ thomeyyā’’ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Visodhetīti mahapphalaṁ karoti.
atk-abh03a32:24_5: Saṅghasmiñhi appaṁ dinnaṁ bahu hoti, bahu dinnaṁ bahutaraṁ. Dakkhiṇeyyāti dakkhiṇārahā
atk-abh03a32:24_6: dakkhiṇāya anucchavikā, dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetuṁ samatthāti attho. Dakkhiṇaṁ ārādhentīti
atk-abh03a32:24_7: sampādenti, appamattikāyapi dakkhiṇāya mahantaṁ phalaṁ pāpuṇantīti attho. Sesaṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
atk-abh03a32:27_0: 795-796. Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅgho bhuñjatītikathā nāma hoti. Tatrāpi ‘‘maggaphalāneva
atk-abh03a32:27_1: saṅgho nāma, na ca tāni kiñci bhuñjanti, tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅgho bhuñjati, pivati,
atk-abh03a32:27_2: khādati, sāyatī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṁyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a32:27_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi saṅgho na bhuñjeyya, saṅghabhattādikaraṇaṁ niratthakaṁ
atk-abh03a32:27_4: bhaveyyā’’ti codetuṁ nanu atthi keci saṅghabhattāni karontītiādimāha. Gaṇabhojanantiādi
atk-abh03a32:27_5: ‘‘yadi saṅgho na bhuñjeyya, kassa gaṇabhojanādīni siyu’’nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Aṭṭha
atk-abh03a32:27_6: pānānīti idampi ‘‘yadi saṅgho na piveyya, kassetāni pānāni satthā anujāneyyā’’ti
atk-abh03a32:27_7: codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Sesamidhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a32:30_0: 797-798. Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅghassa dinnaṁ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti. Tatrāpi
atk-abh03a32:30_1: ‘‘maggaphalāneva saṅgho nāma, na ca sakkā tesaṁ kiñci dātuṁ, na ca tehi paṭiggaṇhituṁ,
atk-abh03a32:30_2: nāpi tesaṁ dānena koci upakāro ijjhati, tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅghassa dinnaṁ mahapphala’’nti
atk-abh03a32:30_3: yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṁyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:30_4: Āhuneyyotiādi ‘‘yadi saṅghassa dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ na bhaveyya, na naṁ satthā evaṁ
atk-abh03a32:30_5: thomeyyā’’ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Sesaṁ yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a32:33_0: 799. Idāni na vattabbaṁ buddhassa dinnaṁ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘buddho
atk-abh03a32:33_1: bhagavā na kiñci paribhuñjati, lokānuvattanatthaṁ pana paribhuñjamānaṁ viya attānaṁ
atk-abh03a32:33_2: dasseti, tasmā nirupakārattā na vattabbaṁ tasmiṁ dinnaṁ mahapphala’’nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:33_3: seyyathāpi tesaṁyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Dvipadānaṁ
atk-abh03a32:33_4: aggotiādi ‘‘manussadussīlepi dānaṁ sahassaguṇaṁ hoti, kimaṅgaṁ pana evarūpe aggapuggale’’ti
atk-abh03a32:36_0: 800-801. Idāni dakkhiṇāvisuddhikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yadi paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇā
atk-abh03a32:36_1: visujjheyya, mahapphalā bhaveyya. Dāyakena dānaṁ dinnaṁ, paṭiggāhakena vipāko nibbattitoti
atk-abh03a32:36_2: añño aññassa kārako bhaveyya, paraṁkataṁ sukhadukkhaṁ āpajjeyya, añño kareyya, añño
atk-abh03a32:36_3: paṭisaṁvedeyya. Tasmā dāyakatova dānaṁ visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato, dāyakasseva
atk-abh03a32:36_4: cittavisuddhi vipākadāyikā hotī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ; te
atk-abh03a32:36_5: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Āhuneyyātiādi ‘‘yadi paṭiggāhakato
atk-abh03a32:36_6: dānaṁ na visujjheyya, kimassa āhuneyyādibhāvo kareyyā’’ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Añño
atk-abh03a32:36_7: aññassa kārakoti yadi dāyakassa dānacetanā paṭiggāhakena katā bhaveyya, yuttarūpaṁ
atk-abh03a32:36_8: siyā. Tassa pana dānacetanā parisuddhā paṭiggāhakasaṅkhātaṁ vatthuṁ paṭicca mahāvipākaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a32:36_9: visujjhati, tasmā acodanā esā ‘‘paṭiggāhakato dānaṁ visujjhatī’’ti.
